org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor

Interface DataNormalization

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSetPreProcessor, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImagePreProcessingScaler, NormalizerMinMaxScaler, NormalizerStandardize

    public interface DataNormalization
extends DataSetPreProcessor
    An interface for data normalizers. Data normalizers compute some sort of statistics over a dataset and scale the data in some way.
